short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Real-time advertising trends from 10,000+ Shopify stores.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever wanted to view real-time advertising trends of over 10,000+ Shopify stores in a convenient stock market ticker?

Look no further! Triple Whale presents: Whale Watcher.

Facebook, Google, and Blended CPM, CTR, CPC, and ROAS over the past four weeks; directly from Triple Whale's real-time databases! 

View in your current browser window, or pop out and place anywhere!

Make informed decisions based on real time data; powered by Triple Whale.
